sentences.en: "Here's your ticket," he said, and he tore it off the pad.
sentences.cn: “给你票，”他说着，从票本上把票撕了下来。

sentences.en: a pad of paper
sentences.cn: 一本拍纸簿

sentences.en: All the sharp corners were padded with foam.
sentences.cn: 所有的棱角都垫上了泡沫塑料。

sentences.en: Come back to my pad.
sentences.cn: 回到我的住处.

sentences.en: Each student should have a pencil and pad.
sentences.cn: 每个学生应该有一支铅笔和一本拍纸簿.

sentences.en: I made a memo on my memo - pad to buy more coffee.
sentences.cn: 我在记事簿上记下了要再买些咖啡.

sentences.en: I moved on round the big house to reach my pad.
sentences.cn: 我绕过大房子走向我的公寓。

sentences.en: It wouldn't have occurred to me to get myself a bachelor pad.
sentences.cn: 否则我不会想到给自己找一套单身公寓。

sentences.en: Journalists report seeing a fire on the pad after the launch.
sentences.cn: 记者们报道说在发射后看到发射台着火了。

sentences.en: Keep a pad handy to jot down queries as they occur.
sentences.cn: 手边放一本便笺簿，以便有问题时随时记下。

sentences.en: Keep a telephone pad and a pen to hand.
sentences.cn: 手边准备一本电话记事簿和一支笔。

sentences.en: Pad the back of a car seat with a pillow.
sentences.cn: 在汽车座椅靠背上垫一个头枕。

sentences.en: She made a brief note on the telephone pad.
sentences.cn: 她在电话通讯簿上记下简短的话.

sentences.en: She padded barefoot down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 她光着脚轻轻地下了楼。

sentences.en: She scribbled down the directions on her pad.
sentences.cn: 她在拍纸簿上潦草地记下了指示.

sentences.en: She wrote on a pad of paper.
sentences.cn: 她写在了便笺簿上。

sentences.en: The child let his mother pad the chair.
sentences.cn: 这个小孩让他妈妈把椅子加上垫子.

sentences.en: The helicopter was hovering about 100 metres above the pad.
sentences.cn: 直升机在离发射台一百米的上空盘旋.

sentences.en: The pad is impregnated with insecticide.
sentences.cn: 垫子上满是杀虫剂。

sentences.en: Use an abrasive pad for stubborn stains.
sentences.cn: 用百洁布擦洗顽固污渍。

sentences.en: Wimbledon has been a launch pad for so many players.
sentences.cn: 温布尔登一直是成就众多球手的地方。

words.tran_cn: 有装填垫料的；脚底有厚肉的
整垫电容；[电] 微调电容器

phrases.tran_cn: 刹车片；盘式刹车片；制动衬块；闸垫
拉长；扩充（尤指文章，讲话）
在比赛（尤指板球赛）前穿上防护垫
百洁布；擦洗用的钢丝绒
可倾瓦块；扇形支座；倾斜垫

trans.tran_cn: 垫，衬垫，护具，便签本，发射台
trans.tran_en: a thick flat object made of cloth or rubber, used to protect or clean something, or to make something more comfortable
If you pad something, you put something soft in it or over it in order to make it less hard, to protect it, or to give it a different shape

trans.tran_cn: 给…装衬垫， 加垫子，填塞，踏平
trans.tran_en: If you pad something, you put something soft in it or over it in order to make it less hard, to protect it, or to give it a different shape
